game.name: Monster Wheels 2
game.description:
In the field and era of online racing game, there are many ways and mediums that could be substituted for the track and circuit of the game. The monster wheels 2 is such a gaming opportunity, where, you get directly indulged the some serious type of online racing game including like truck racing. The online racing game to play is played on the circuit that is filled with car scraps, boulders, slope and heights. The monster wheels of the trucks that you are driving in this online game are too big and are the real test of your driving skills.

As you are into the contest of racing with fellow racers so in the competition it is of the utmost care to handle the vehicle of this magnitude in terms of speed as well as balance in this online racing game for kids. A slight miss adventure on your part could cause the vehicle to get completely demolished and crashed causing you to begin the truck racing game once again.

Before beginning this online racing game, there are total 32 levels in this game for a player to win about. The customization for getting the monster vehicle on a default credit price is already given out there. You can choose from any number of vehicles offered in the game play. There are coins and scores you keep on getting as you jump from one level to the next level in the game. For control in this best racing game arrow keys are used for movements and spacebar used for nitro.
game.metaTitle: Monster Wheels 2, Truck Racing Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: This game of online racing is being kept around the objective of getting with the heaviest vehicles driving joy at one of the toughest terrain.
